name: InspirationalQuotes
0:
”Alexa, open inspirational quotes”
”Alexa, start inspirational quotes”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: inspirational quotes
des: Start your day with these inspirational quotes! If you're an educator, student, lifelong learner, tutor, coach, or trainer, you'll LOVE these quotes. When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next quote. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.
